adjective.description: Of a plant: (originally) †belonging or allied to the ferns (obsolete); (now) specifically belonging to the subfamily Pteridoideae (family Pteridaceae).

noun.description: A fern, especially one belonging to the subfamily Pteridoideae.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in The Pall Mall Gazette. From classical Latin pterid-, pteris pteris + -oid, after scientific Latin Pteris, genus name. In later use after scientific Latin Pteridoideae, family name.
